Detailed Description

Interface between the console and the daemon, that executes commands requested by the libconsole library.

Version:
$Header$

Definition in file kurud_console.h.

Define Documentation

#define KURUD_COMMAND_LIST_REQUEST   (-1)

Command ID used to request the list of commands from a layer.

int kurud_console_init (  ) 

Creates the socket for receiving console commands and listens to each command request, delegating command execution to each layer.

Returns:
KURUD_OK if no error occurs, KURUD_ERROR otherwise.
